plot: A journey into the mind of a homeless man who is trying to stay connected with reality as he struggles to protect a runaway boy and the girl he loves.
title: The Magic Stone
plot_es: A journey into the mind of a homeless man who is trying to stay connected with reality as he struggles to protect a runaway boy and the girl he loves.
plot_en: A journey into the mind of a homeless man who is trying to stay connected with reality as he struggles to protect a runaway boy and the girl he loves.
